Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat pottery plate, with turn of stem; brown clay; exterior: band on lower wall and top of stem glazed; interior: fugitive cream slip; in tondo, star of lozenges and buds; tondo bordered by red band between glaze bands; to outside outside, partly preserved tendrils; inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 433)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.738)
